org.ninit.models.bm25
Class BM25Similarity

java.lang.Object
  Similarity
      org.ninit.models.bm25.BM25Similarity

public class BM25Similarity
extends Similarity

Similarity for BM25 ranking functions family.
This class only implements public float idf(int docFreq, int numDocs), others method always return 1 and are never invoked from the Scorers.
IDF is implemented as next:
log ((N-n+0.5)/(n+0.5))
where n = docFreq(term) and N = numDocs().

Author:
"Joaquin Perez-Iglesias"
